content.rendered:
Implant Delivery Device

Delivering a product portfolio built for the future

With an array of trusted surgical brands and innovative new offerings, Tiger Aesthetics is advancing the fields of reconstruction and aesthetic medicine. We are committed to enabling surgeons with the agility, confidence, and freedom to provide the best for their patients.

TIGER GUARD™ is a sterile, single use delivery device for gel breast implants with minimal or no touch of the implant, surrounding tissue, and the incision.

  • Employs a No-Touch delivery technique which may reduce post operative complications1,2,3
  • May allow for smaller incisions than classic insertion techniques
  • Ease of insertion may reduce surgery time in the OR making the process more efficient4
  • Designed for compatibility with all major implant types and sizes available in the US
  • Ideal visualization of the implant throughout the procedure
REFERENCES:
  1. Moyer, HR, et al. Contamination in Smooth Gel Breast Implant Placement:Testing a Funnel Versus Digital Insertion Technique in a Cadaver Model. Aesthetic Surgery Journal. 2012; 32(2) 194-199.
  2. Flugstad, NA, et al. Does Implant Insertion with a Funnel Decrease Capsular Contracture? A Preliminary Report Nicholas. Aesthetic Surgery Journal. 2016; 26 (5). 550-556.
  3. Montemurro, P, et al. Controllable factors to reduce the Rate of Complications in Primary Breast Augmentation: Review of the Literature. Aesthetic Plastic Surgery. 2020.
  4. Montemurro et al. Implant insertion time and incision lengthin breast augmentation surgery with the Keller Funnel: Results from a comparative study. Aesth Plast Surg. 2019; 43; 881 – 889.

How to use Tiger Guard

Find out how you can enjoy more agility, confidence and freedom.

Contact a Representative
